item.title: By: Upmystreet
item.dc:creator: Upmystreet
item.description: Another great "where to live" website is HoodPoints. This website also allows people to share crime reports.
item.content:encoded: Another great “where to live” website is HoodPoints. This website also allows people to share crime reports.

item.title: By: Paul M. Watson
item.dc:creator: Paul M. Watson
item.description: Ah, an iPhone version, now I am sold. Looking up places from my laptop is nice but having the same service in my pocket is genuinely useful. The site looks even better on the iPhone. Now if only the iPhone provided GPS location data through Mobile Safari.
item.content:encoded: Ah, an iPhone version, now I am sold. Looking up places from my laptop is nice but having the same service in my pocket is genuinely useful. The site looks even better on the iPhone. Now if only the iPhone provided GPS location data through Mobile Safari.

item.title: By: Mike Brennan
item.dc:creator: Mike Brennan
item.description: Thanks Paul, glad you liked it! We also have a (beta) iPhone version of the site, which you might find useful.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Paul, glad you liked it! We also have a (beta) iPhone version of the site, which you might find useful.

item.title: By: Paul M. Watson
item.dc:creator: Paul M. Watson
item.description: Great looking site and really easy to use. Nice job guys.
item.content:encoded: Great looking site and really easy to use. Nice job guys.
